accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Whaling Photo Album, Accession #Acc. 2010.103, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased in February 2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally processed in February 2010 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Photo album, containing 12 photographs (2"x3") depicting whales, their slaughter and processing on a New England beach around the turn of the century. It is not clear whether the whales were hunted or stranded.
